version_description:
- Add language support form to option-language
- The necessary experience to get a higher level in Character Abilities has been decreased.
The upper limit for Character Abilities level has been increased.
- Spelling mistakes have been fixed.
-
bug fix

- Add items
- Other small corrections and improvements.
